plot: The small island of Mauritius is a huge tourist attraction and describes itself as a "Paradise". But just blocks away from hotels there are slums. This is an inside look at those in poverty.
title: Bienvenue au Paradis
plot_es: The small island of Mauritius is a huge tourist attraction and describes itself as a "Paradise". But just blocks away from hotels there are slums. This is an inside look at those in poverty.
plot_en: The small island of Mauritius is a huge tourist attraction and describes itself as a "Paradise". But just blocks away from hotels there are slums. This is an inside look at those in poverty.
